name: Smashit
description:
Small smash-like game to be played with a friend on the same keyboard.

ps : The game is not finished yet, this is our first jam and we couldn't make a build in time so we published this previous build we had just so we could participate. 

We are working on a refactor and graphics improvements later this week so maybe something cool comes out of this.
